changes in medical licensing requirements justify his request for leave

legal_basis: Corrections and Conditional Release Act and Regulations
application_details: Mr. Mackay wanted to purchase a thesaurus for educational purposes
decision_reasoning: A thesaurus aids in learning and writing, qualifying it as an educational textbook
conclusion_outcome: A thesaurus is an educational textbook or supply, exempt from the $1,500 limit
result_of_case: Matter referred to a new decision-maker
relevant_rule: educational textbooks or supplies are exempt from the $1,500 limit
